page.title: 10DIALYSING (3) LITTLE MILL
page.content: The effect on my eldest child was more noticeable than on my younger one.The youngest had grown up with my renal failure and knew no other way of life for me.My eldest was 8 years when I fell ill,old enough to know that I nearly died when I first started dialysis and could remember life prior to the machine days.The machine and way of life causes stress amongst the family.My husband has been a constant "tower of strength" for me. I rely on water,electricity,specialist medical staff,high technology and technicians and a stable home situation to survive. However one can live with these conditions and will strive to survive because is an inborn characteristic. I have lived in this way for 11 years and hope to live to have a successful transplant and return to normal life.
